# Max Int8

> Maximum signed 8-bit integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var INT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int8-max' );
```

#### INT8_MAX

Maximum 8-bit signed integer.

``` javascript
INT8_MAX === 127;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var INT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/int8-max' );

console.log( INT8_MAX );
// => 127
```

</section>
